trends: There have been 216 other sightings in Philadelphia
There were no other sightings in Philadelphia on or around August 17th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsI dropped my sister home on Slocum Ave in Mount Airy section of Philadelphia about 8:30 pm. I made a left turn onto Mansfield Ave. Once I got to the first cross street I noticed the full moon and southeast of the moon I saw five bright circles close and somewhat sporadic still in the sky, I moved a little further and saw them in a straight line. I pulled over and snapped two pictures with my cell phone. I got a little scared because of the phone's flash. I pulled off then went home.
Summary: I saw 5 bright circles that were still and started moving into a differently
